sentences.en: So the best way to get around Naxos is by one of these.
sentences.zh: 在纳克索斯岛出行，最好的方式是选择这个交通工具。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ ðə bɛst weɪ tə ɡɛt əˈraʊnd ˈnæksɑs ɪz baɪ wʌn əv ðiz/

sentences.zh: 也不是，其实有多种选择。

sentences.en: You can hire a scooter, which will be around 40 euro per day.
sentences.zh: 你可以租辆小电动，每天约40欧元。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ju kæn ˈhaɪər ə ˈskutər, wɪʧ wɪl bi əˈraʊnd ˈfɔrti ˈjʊroʊ pɜr deɪ/

sentences.en: We hired an ATV, which is about 40 euro a day.
sentences.zh: 我们租的是全地形车，同样是每天40欧元左右。
sentences.phonetic_us: /wi ˈhaɪərd ən ˌeɪˌtiˈvi, wɪʧ ɪz əˈbaʊt ˈfɔrti ˈjʊroʊ ə deɪ/

sentences.en: There are also some dune buggies that you can get, otherwise you can get a car.
sentences.zh: 还有沙滩车可选，或者直接租辆汽车。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðɛr ɑr ˈɔlsoʊ sʌm dun ˈbʌɡiz ðæt ju kæn ɡɛt, ˈʌðərˌwaɪz ju kæn ɡɛt ə kɑr/

sentences.en: But we recommend getting some sort of transport because Naxos is a huge island.
sentences.zh: 我们推荐你租这种类似的交通工具，因为纳克索斯是一个很大的岛屿。
sentences.phonetic_us: /bʌt wi ˌrɛkəˈmɛnd ˈɡɛtɪŋ sʌm sɔrt əv ˈtrænspɔrt bɪˈkɔz ˈnæksɑs ɪz ə hjudʒ ˈaɪlənd/

sentences.en: It's actually one of the biggest in the Greek islands.
sentences.zh: 是希腊群岛中最大的岛屿之一。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪts ˈækʧuəli wʌn əv ðə ˈbɪɡəst ɪn ðə ɡrik ˈaɪləndz/

sentences.en: And it's really hard to walk around unless you just wanna stay in one area, but you're gonna wanna explore, so definitely recommend grabbing one of these.
sentences.zh: 如果没有交通工具，想四处走动会很难，除非你只打算呆在一个地方，但如果你会想去探索，一定要取一辆。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ɪts ˈrɪli hɑrd tə wɔk əˈraʊnd ənˈlɛs ju ʤʌst ˈwɑnə steɪ ɪn wʌn ˈɛriə, bʌt jʊər ˈɡɑnə ˈwɑnə ɪkˈsplɔr, soʊ ˈdɛfənətli ˌrɛkəˈmɛnd ˈɡræbɪŋ wʌn əv ðiz/

sentences.en: And there are just so many places around town as well that you can just whip in and get it sorted.
sentences.zh: 而且镇上有很多地方，你可以随时进去租车。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ðɛr ɑr ʤʌst soʊ ˈmɛni ˈpleɪsəz əˈraʊnd taʊn æz wɛl ðæt ju kæn ʤʌst wɪp ɪn ænd ɡɛt ɪt ˈsɔrtɪd/

highlight_entries.display_text: whip in and get it sorted
